Polls open in Taiwan's critical elections watched closely by ChinaPolls opened on Saturday in Taiwan's presidential and parliamentary elections which China has framed as a choice between war and peace and are happening as Beijing ramps up pressure to get the island to accept its sovereignty. Sat, 13 Jan 2024 00:06:20 GMT KNSNU4B6A5OSXG5Q63SITRAPWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/polls-open-taiwan-ritic-elections-watched-closely-by-china-2024-01-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
UN aid chief calls anew for Gaza ceasefire, urges UN action to end warThe U.N. aid chief on Friday said he was "deeply alarmed" by Israeli ministers' statements about "plans to encourage the mass transfer" of Palestinian civilians from the Gaza Strip to third countries and he called anew for a ceasefire. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 21:45:25 GMT JHJZ5HILL5ITZFKZUSDGG3FFP4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-aid-chief-calls-new-gaza-ceasefire-urges-an-action-to-end-war-2024-01-12/Jonathan Landay, Daphne Psaledakis世界中东地区
Venezuela's 2023 inflation hit nearly 190%, but December prices barely ticked upVenezuela's annual inflation rate settled at 189.8% last year, according to data from the central bank released on Friday, marking a slight easing of the still sky-high rate of rising consumer prices in the South American nation's battered economy. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 21:38:30 GMT PGSFAAD3D5ICTGE5OYPOYOPSVU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/venezuelas-2023-inflation-hit-nearly-190-december-prices-barely-ticked-up-2024-01-12/Reuters世界美洲
US optimistic Yemen strikes degraded Houthi capabilitiesThe Pentagon on Friday appeared to be cautiously optimistic that Iran-backed Houthis will be unable to replicate the type of complex attacks they recently carried out in the Red Sea, as a senior Pentagon official disclosed that overnight strikes hit nearly 30 locations in Yemen. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 21:33:08 GMT ZPQ3YGXCNNO4ZO52I2QDU27J5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-optimistic-yemen-strikes-degraded-houthi-capability-2024-01-12/Idrees Ali, Phil Stewart世界中东地区
Biden says Yemen's Houthis are a 'terrorist' groupU.S. President Joe Biden on Friday called Yemen's Houthi forces a "terrorist" group, after American and British warplanes, ships and submarines launched dozens of air strikes across Yemen overnight. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 21:26:22 GMT YQ2LL7YCLBMSBDSU4YMTEWUPRM https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-says-yemen-houthis-are-terrorist-group-2024-01-12/Nandita Bose, Kanishka Singh世界
Canada doesn't accept premise of S. Africa genocide motion -PMCanada does not accept the premise of South Africa's case at the International Court of Justice which accuses Israel of committing genocide in Gaza, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 21:11:42 GMT LBKO65DJXZMR5ENFKYE2HYM72Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canada-doesnt-accept-premise-s-africa-genocide-motion-pm-2024-01-12/David Ljunggren, Steve Scherer世界美洲
Separatists say Moldova wants to use Ukrainian soldiers to plan attacksMoldova's pro-Russian separatist Transdniestria region accused central authorities in the ex-Soviet state on Friday of training Ukrainian soldiers to launch attacks on the rebel area's institutions and leaders. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 20:55:44 GMT WVXCYBMMUNMGJIH4KA225V2GPM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/separatists-say-moldova-wants-to-use-ukrainian-soldiers-plan-attacks-2024-01-12/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Explainer: Did Biden break the law by ordering Yemen airstrikes?Some members of the U.S. Congress have charged that President Joe Biden violated the Constitution by authorizing overnight strikes on Yemen. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 20:51:58 GMT RXDORCYU7BOB7GF6AG2SJDKXUI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/did-biden-break-law-by-ordering-yemen-airstrikes-2024-01-12/Patricia Zengerle世界美国
Italy's junior culture minister investigated over stolen paintingItaly's junior culture minister Vittorio Sgarbi, an art critic and outspoken TV personality whose brief includes protecting the country's cultural heritage, is under investigation over a 17th century painting in his possession that police said on Friday had been stolen. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 20:16:22 GMT AFVEWZS6HZN6ZFYTV3322LRFU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italy-junior-culture-minister-investigated-over-chair-painting-2024-01-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Biden approved Yemen strikes after drone attack, US doesn't want war - White HouseThe United States does not want war with Yemen but will not hesitate to take further action, the White House said on Friday, adding President Joe Biden approved the U.S. strikes on Tuesday in response to a Houthi drone strike in the Red Sea. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 19:47:42 GMT 7GLGRNZBVZMKFEIR4JK2FGPCEA https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-approved-yemen-strikes-after-drone-attack-us-doesnt-want-war-white-house-2024-01-12/Reuters世界
China coal mine accident kills at least 8, rescue ops underway - XinhuaRescue operations were underway after eight people died and 15 missing following an accident in a coal mine in the city of Pingdingshan, central China's Henan Province on Friday, state news agency Xinhua reported. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 17:39:24 GMT 2AR4H32NMZN7ZCOPQ4DSXGFLX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/rescue-underway-chinese-coal-mine-accident-leaves-ateast-8-dead-xinhua-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中国
